name: ENDLESS Runner (RemuWarlord)
description:
Game Assets Used: 

- https://quaternius.itch.io/platformer-pack

- https://fertile-soil-productions.itch.io/modular-terrain-pack

- https://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-kit

- https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-robot

- https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-animated-monsters

An Endless Runner Game that is inpired by Dark Souls. The Gameplay involve player to get over obstacles and balance their stamina. Watch out for Spikes Breathing Dragons!
